text: Ana nehu'za tagrama ne'za a'o nehuta, tavufgama anteramita nemanunana nonkano hu'za nehaze. Ana kema haza nona'a Ra Anumzamo'na amanage nehue, anama ne'zama a'o huta nunamuma haza zupa, tamagra'ama tamazeri muse hu'zankuke tamagesa nentahita, eri'za vahetamia tutu huzmantazage'za eri'zana e'nerize.
